moves.8... e6 9. Bd3: Alternative: 9. Bb5 Qc7 10. Qa4 Bd6 unc.

10.dxc5?
Disliked.
Better: 10. Qa4 a6 (10... Bd6) etc
moves.10... Bxc5 11. b4:
11.b4? 
Creating weakness at c3.
Preferable: 11. h3 or 11.Bd2
moves.11... Bd6: Even more convincing than: 11... Bb6 12. Bb2
moves.12... Ne5:
12...,Ne5
A solid move.
Inferior would be: 12... O-O 13. Bxg6! fxg6 
(13... Ne5! 14. Bxf7+ Rxf7 15. Nxf7 Kxf7) 
14. Nxe6 Qe7 15. Nxf8 etc
Playable seems also: 12... Rxh2 13. Rxh2 Bxh2 14. g3 Ne5! 15. Be2 -/+
moves.13. Bb5+ Kf8 14. f4: No improvement from: 14. Qd4 Neg4 15. Qxa7 Nxh2-/+
moves.14... Neg4 15. e4:
15.e4?
Lost im dispair
